errors.error_description: Added unnecessary dependencies without specifying installation method or verifying if they are actually required for viewer.py
correction_candidates: Remove the pip install command entirely and just run ./viewer.py directly
Install dependencies using conda install opencv-python numpy matplotlib instead
Check requirements.txt file first, then install only the dependencies listed there
Create a virtual environment first, then install the specific versions needed
errors.golden_answer: Remove the pip install command entirely and just run ./viewer.py directly
